title: G41显卡不换系统怎么在win10打开啊？
author: 懒得取了
txt_content:
-- System Details --
Details:
        Minecraft Version: 1.14.2
        Operating System: Windows 10 (amd64) version 10.0
        Java Version: 1.8.0_211, Oracle Corporation
        Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
        Memory: 70147752 bytes (66 MB) / 369098752 bytes (352 MB) up to 1073741824 bytes (1024 MB)
        JVM Flags: 11 total; -XX:+UnlockExperimentalVMOptions -XX:+UseG1GC -XX:G1NewSizePercent=20 -XX:G1ReservePercent=20 -XX:MaxGCPauseMillis=50 -XX:G1HeapRegionSize=16M -XX:-UseAdaptiveSizePolicy -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -Xmn128m -Xmx1024m -XX:HeapDumpPath=MojangTricksIntelDriversForPerformance_javaw.exe_minecraft.exe.heapdump
        Launched Version: HMCL 3.2.137
        LWJGL: 3.2.1 build 12
        OpenGL: NO CONTEXT
        GL Caps: 
        Using VBOs: Yes
        Is Modded: Probably not. Jar signature remains and client brand is untouched.
        Type: Client (map_client.txt)
        Resource Packs: 
        Current Language: ~~ERROR~~ NullPointerException: null
        CPU: <unknown>
#@!@# Game crashed! Crash report saved to: #@!@# C:\Users\Administor\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2019-11-03_13.26.09-client.txt求解。

replies.author: 懒得取了
replies.txt_content:

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
显卡驱动未安装或错误，请在设备管理器中检查显卡驱动状态是否正常。你可使用驱动人生/驱动精灵更新显卡驱动。

如果你的机型较老且是集成显卡，刚刚升级到win10发现此问题，建议降级回win7系统
